name: Forum of Revolutions in Renewable Energy in 21st Century
content: Innovinc International welcomes you to attend the FORUM OF REVOLUTIONS IN RENEWABLE ENERGY IN 21ST CENTURY during October 07-09, 2019 Rome, Italy. The theme of the conference is “The prime priority of the 21st century”. We cordially invite all the participants who are interested in sharing their knowledge and research in the area of Renewable Energy.
